Item 3.03 - Material Modification to Rig.content: On May 20, 2021, JPMorgan Chase & Co. (the “Company”) issued 185,000 shares of the Company’s 4.625% Non-Cumulative Preferred Stock, Series LL, which modifies the rights of security holders.

subsections.issuance_details: The Company issued 185,000 shares (the “Shares”) of the Company’s 4.625% Non-Cumulative Preferred Stock, Series LL, par value of $1.00 per share and with a liquidation preference of $10,000 per share (the “Series LL Preferred Stock”). These Shares were deposited against delivery of depositary receipts evidencing 74,000,000 depositary shares, each representing a 1/400th interest in a Share, issued by Computershare Inc., as depositary.
subsections.restrictions_on_other_stock: Under the terms of the Series LL Preferred Stock, the ability of the Company to pay dividends on, make distributions with respect to, or to redeem, purchase or acquire, or make a liquidation payment on its common stock or any preferred stock ranking on a parity with or junior to the Series LL Preferred Stock, will be subject to restrictions in the event that the Company does not declare dividends on the Series LL Preferred Stock for the most recently completed dividend period or, in the case of any such liquidation payment, does not pay to holders of the Series LL Preferred Stock liquidation distributions of $10,000 per Share, plus any declared and unpaid dividends.
subsections.governing_documents: The terms of the Series LL Preferred Stock are more fully described in the Certificate of Designations (Exhibit 3.1) and the form of certificate (Exhibit 4.1). The terms of the Depositary Shares are set forth in the Deposit Agreement, dated May 20, 2021 (Exhibit 4.2) and the form of Depositary Receipt (Exhibit 4.3).

Item 5.03 - Amendments to Articles of In.content: On May 19, 2021, the Company filed a Certificate of Designations, Powers, Preferences and Rights with the Secretary of State of the State of Delaware.

subsections.certificate_details: The certificate establishes the rights, preferences, privileges, qualifications, restrictions and limitations relating to the Series LL Preferred Stock. The Certificate of Designations became effective upon filing.
subsections.exhibit_reference: A copy of the Certificate of Designations is included as Exhibit 3.1 to this Current Report on Form 8-K and is incorporated by reference herein.

Item 8.01 - Other Events.content: On May 20, 2021, the Company completed the issuance and sale of 185,000 Shares of Series LL Preferred Stock.

subsections.transaction_details: The shares were deposited against delivery of Depositary Receipts evidencing 74,000,000 Depositary Shares, pursuant to an Underwriting Agreement, dated May 13, 2021, among the Company, J.P. Morgan Securities LLC and the other several underwriters named therein.
subsections.registration_and_legal_opinion: The sale of the Depositary Shares was made pursuant to the Company’s Registration Statement on Form S-3 (File No. 333-230098). In connection with this offering, the legal opinion as to the legality of the Depositary Shares and the Series LL Preferred Stock is being filed as Exhibit 5.1 to this Current Report on Form 8-K.
